im.tox.jtoxcore

Interface FriendList<F extends ToxFriend>

  • Type Parameters:
    F - Friend type to use with the FriendList instance

    public interface FriendList<F extends ToxFriend>
    Interface definition for a Tox Friendlist implementation
    Author:
    sonOfRa

    • Method Detail

      • getByFriendNumber

        F getByFriendNumber(int friendnumber)
        Retrieve a friend from the list by its number
        Parameters:
        friendnumber - the number to look for
        Returns:
        the first friend in the list with the specified friendnumber. Null if no such friend exists.

      • getById

        F getById(java.lang.String id)
        Retrieve a friend by its client id.
        Parameters:
        id - the id to search for
        Returns:
        the first friend in the list with the specified client id. Null if no such friend exists.

      • getByName

        java.util.List<F> getByName(java.lang.String name,
                          boolean ignorecase)
        Retrieve all friends with the specified name
        Parameters:
        name - the name to look for
        ignorecase - when true, this call must ignore the case of results
        Returns:
        a list containing all friends with the specified name. If no results are found, an empty List is returned.

      • searchFriend

        java.util.List<F> searchFriend(java.lang.String partial)
        Retrieve all Friends that have the content of partial inside of their names. This method should ignore the case when comparing.
        Parameters:
        partial - the partial String to look for
        Returns:
        a List containing all friends that match the partial String. If no results are found, an empty List is returned.

      • getByStatus

        java.util.List<F> getByStatus(ToxUserStatus status)
        Get all friends that are currently online and have the specified status.
        Parameters:
        status - the status to search for
        Returns:
        a List containing all friends with the specified status. If no friends have that status, an empty List is returned.

      • getOnlineFriends

        java.util.List<F> getOnlineFriends()
        Get all currently online friends
        Returns:
        a List containing all online friends. If no friends are online, an empty List is returned.

      • getOfflineFriends

        java.util.List<F> getOfflineFriends()
        Get all currently offline friends
        Returns:
        a List containing all offline friends. If no friends are offline, an empty List is returned.

      • all

        java.util.List<F> all()
        Get all friends
        Returns:
        a List containing all friends. If there are no friends, an empty List is returned.

      • addFriend

        F addFriend(int friendnumber)
                              throws FriendExistsException
        Create the new friend and add it to the list
        Parameters:
        friendnumber - the new friend
        Returns:
        the newly created friend
        Throws:
        FriendExistsException - if a friend with that friendnumber already exists.

      • addFriendIfNotExists

        F addFriendIfNotExists(int friendnumber)
        Create the new friend and add it to the list
        Parameters:
        friendnumber - the new friend
        Returns:
        the newly created friend, or the friend with the specified friend number

      • removeFriend

        void removeFriend(int friendnumber)
        Remove the friend associated with that friendnumber
        Parameters:
        friendnumber - the friendnumber to remove
